website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quality issues and subpar glue, it's an affordable craft kit that challenges kids' imaginations. Also practical for toddlers new to crafting.
pros: An easy-to-use craft kit that's ideal for kids of all ages
Includes shapes, bags, stickers, and more for making colorful paper bag puppets
A good choice for group fun
cons: The glue doesn't hold up very well, and some consumers received kits with glue sticks that were dried out
A few reports of missing pieces upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: New price is way too much
customer_reviews.text: My two year old and I did half of the puppets in this set today and had a blast. Afterward shw wanted to name them and host a,puppet show. This is a great product and we'll made. It was also definitely worth the original price point I paid of 6.80. Now, however, it's running at 13.50, which strikes me as absurd.
customer_reviews.author: Mfa graduate and stay at home mom

customer_reviews.title: Craft Kits a hit with children.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different Alex craft kits for my grandchildren for Christmas - the Paper Bag Monsters, the Paper Plate Bugs, and Paper Bag Puppets. The materials are colorful. Each kit had the supplies necessary to complete the project. Why give the product only three stars? The glue stick that comes with the kit is terrible. So frustrating for a little one (we were working with children 4 - 8) to apply a part and immediately have it fall off because the glue would not hold. We eventually had to find an old Elmer's glue stick and go from there. The glue stick needs to be high quality that will ensure immediate bonding.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis P. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect craft kit for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality and usability of this item. I buy alot of toddler craft kits and this one is perfect for ages 4-6. The fact that each puppet and its pieces are individually bagged with the exact pieces required to complete it makes the craft very enjoyable as it gives specific direction for success. No frustration that you run out of a certain shape or color. The instructions are easy for a toddler to follow also. No reading required, just the ability to match colors and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: AGR710

customer_reviews.title: Duplicates monsters then the 5 different ones shown :-(
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with how easy they were to use, and we do a fun craft every other Friday with my kids, 1 of my kids is Autistic + and when we got this he really wanted the yellow monster, he was so excited about it and when we opened it we realized we had 2 purple and a pink a blue and a green. No yellow. I have 3 boys and this caused a problem. I was hoping to at least get a yellow, green and blue for them. I almost ordered a cheaper one that had more inside.... so just be aware that you could get duplicates monsters then the 5 differnt shown.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Monster Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons LOVED these. We went for a week to babysit 2 & 6 yr old grandsons. I always take projects. This was by far their favorite. The colors are vibrant, and the bags are nice quality, The glue stick is great - it goes on purple so you can see where you put it, it holds well, then dries clear and fast. Each monster kit is packaged separately and includes everything you need. Some parts are glue on, some are stickers. The 2 year old needed lots of help, but the 6 year old could do most of it himself. Then they ran around with their puppets growling and chasing each other and laughing like little crazies.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for busy little hands!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 y/o twin boys LOVE the crafts from this brand. Reasonably priced and provide HOURS of fun for my boys! The glue stick is gigantic which is a bonus as it lasts long after we finish the projects in this box and therefore we have it for other projects down the road. The pieces are all well made so little eager hands can pop the pieces out themselves and they don't rip. I can't recommend this line of crafts enough- they are wonderful- educational and super fun for family art time around the table!
customer_reviews.author: HrnyhairyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good project!
customer_reviews.text: This was really fun for my 4 yr old grandson and me to do together. He LOVED the giant glue stick and gluing the parts on. And, there are sticker embellishments - always a hit with him. Of course we customized ours a little bit. The bags are good quality, the parts are each to remove from the packing and to attach. Directions are clear - and results are very cute. We had a good time entertaining the baby with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nanc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, cute ideas and child loves it
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and a great way to do some satisfying art with a small child in a container way. We have actually packed oneand done out while waiting in a doctors office, pulled one at home to do with friend visiting and have done plenty on our own for art time. The puppets are so so cute when done and let the child be creative and really proud of a cute finished piece. Also, because it is kind of a contained piece, i have noticed that it helps him to organize because he thinks about which piece goes where and pops out what’s needed in advance. Definitely good to mix in with regular painting and other art!
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy activity the kids liked
customer_reviews.text: I spontaneously setup this activity with my 4 and 6 year old nephews, and they loved it! They were getting a little bit stir-crazy on a rainy afternoon, and this really took their attention. A big bonus was that I really didn't have to do any prep. Even though I do have my own crafting room, getting all the stuff together would have taken some time. Since this wasn't very expensive, it was well worth the ability to just rip open the package and get to work! (Sometimes a bit more effort can be called upon, but sometimes you just want to get them occupied asap!) 😁
customer_reviews.author: E in LA

customer_reviews.title: Just right she’s 3-5!
customer_reviews.text: This set had the glue stick included which was nice. Some parts required glue stick and others were stickers. Our 2 1/2 year old grandson was able to do stickers but needed help with glue. Our 5 year old grandson did it all alone with a mere glance at the instructions. They both had fun acting out puppet drama! Attractive and reasonably sturdy. Would be great party activity or rainy day craft to go with a monster story book!
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Love the crafts by Alex toys
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th purchase of Alex toys. I love their craft boxes. They are simple and easy for kids to do with minimal supervision. The crafts dont carry anything that you would not get from market or you cant cut but in the busy lives, we often do not collect all materials to make the complete craft. The package includes everything that you'd need to make paper puppets without a MESS (yes!) It has combination of cardstock cut outs and stickers to build the craft. And the kids love stickers. The end result is wow and the child and parents both feel the sense of accomplishment. The crafts made using Alex toys kits are always display -worthy
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShoppingalways

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: My preschoolers (ages 4 and 5) loved these puppet kits! They don’t have the patience or skills to cut out and glue all the little pieces to make puppets like these from scratch. I was able to help two of them at the same time and they actually looked really cute when they were finished! I would totally buy these again or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: worth 6 bucks but not 12
customer_reviews.text: These are nicely packaged and easy to put together for my 3 year old who loves to craft. I recently pain $6.59 for the set of 5 puppets. Not really worth the $12 it is selling for now. I would buy other kits in this brand if/ when I see a reasonable price. I would have given this a 5 star review if the regular price would have been reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Fun Project!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when our grandchildren were here for the weekend, ages 2 1/2, 6, 5. They needed supervision with the glue, and direction with the sticker placement, but ultimately they all decorated the puppets to their liking. The colors were bright and vivid, and the characters were so cute. The kit would be IDEAL if all the components were stickers, and no glue was required. This would be a fun activity for a child’s birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have an almost 3 year old and his 2.5 year old friend made these together. It was an awesome little kit with everything you needed to do the whole project. Plus there were so many, they were able to do one a piece over several days. Very fun, good amount and quality of materials! Plus it's a creative outlet for little kids that isn't crazy expensive or expecting a lot of inspiration or time from mom to come up with one from scratch. Big fan of this company's arts and crafts kits!
customer_reviews.author: KLR

customer_reviews.title: The materials were fine - except for that glue stick
customer_reviews.text: The materials were fine - except for that glue stick. Glue sticks work fine where both surfaces are fairly rigid and neither will be pulled or bent, but the paper bags in this project are not at all rigid and, given that they are puppets, are meant to have hands put inside them for play. Every single glued piece popped off as soon as it was dry, including legs, tails, mouths and eyes. I had to go through and reinforce every connection with masking tape, which was annoying and lengthy and in some cases tricky to do without messing up the look. Once that was done, my girls had a great time playing with their puppets!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Salkind

customer_reviews.title: Easy Craft Project for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and assemble. Had it as a craft for a sleepover. The kids enjoyed it and had something to play with and take home after. Kids ages ranged from 2 to 10 years old and they were able to make it themselves following the picture directions. The two year old needed help gluing, but other than that was able to do the rest. We secured glued pieces with the extra stickers left over. The paper bag puppets were cute, vibrant, and the quality is great. Best part for me was the clean up! Took 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again... great for 4-6 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: Big hit for the 4 and 6 year old that I live with! We would just take out 2 at a time and it was a nice, time consuming project for the 4 year old. The 6 year old whipped through it, but had a blast playing with it at the end! Lots of puppet shows going on at our house! Everything you would need comes in the kit (although the glue is bad- use your own Elmers glue stick). Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: It's me!

customer_reviews.title: Fun with the granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and I made the frog. With some left over dots we took a paper towel roll covered with paper and made a log to match. Tada speckled frog on a speckled log. She loves to sing that song! Haha, fun! Con: she does have a little trouble making the mouth move. But was our first time trying...
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Fun project
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these craft sets, but this one was my favorite. I used it in a childcare setting and also with my four-year old granddaughter. The four-year old could follow the directions with just a minimum of help from help from me. Younger kids needed more help with the major parts, but they can have the freedom to put the stickers for spots as they please, giving them space for their own decisions without an adult hovering over every step. The puppets are actually quite attractive when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Adele G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little people - quick and easy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are not only super cute when finished but they are perfect for little hands. Each of the 5 monsters are packaged separately with all the materials to make each shown. My daughter is 3 and I am not a "craft mom"... I want to make things with her but some other kits I've bought were 10 hour projects that require the parent to do all the work (Not fun for me or her). These are not like that at all! We put one together in 15 minutes and she was able to make it mostly on her own - making it very enjoyable for her and me and again, super cute when done! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids 4-5
customer_reviews.text: This was a pleasant surprise! Great for kids 4-5. I figured it would be an alright gift considering the price and picture, but once they opened the box it was such a cool surprise! I ended up buying 2 more as gifts for other kids. The animals are all organized in their own pouch with more stickers and decorations to glue on then you need giving a lot of room for creativity. The box comes with the glue and everything you need, and the pieces are all contained nicely so it would be a great thing to bring in the car or to a friends house to entertain the kids.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Alex has the best craft products for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Alex has the best craft products for young kids. These are ALL great to buy and really help grandparents like us that can run around after the kids to have something to do with them when they come over for longer visits. I keep several different kinds of Alex Craft boxes on hand. Their favorites is the scissors one - cutting crafts. These are second.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Sparked My Grandson's Creativity!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5-year-old grandson after he enjoyed another of these kits so much. He really enjoys looking at the pictures for the basic placement of pieces, and then he makes changes to suit himself -- which I love! I think making puppets from bags has sparked his creativity, as now he is using toilet paper rolls, old plastic hangers, and empty plastic bottles to create other works of art.
customer_reviews.author: July 1955

customer_reviews.title: A big hit
customer_reviews.text: Our 4&1/2 yo grandson really loved this art kit. We helped him a little with the glue placement but he did the rest. The colors are bright and it inspired him to make a couple out of plain brown bags. Grandpa made a paper fly for the frog to eat.
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend highly enough
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous craft for littles!! Well planned out and VERY easy for a child to do. All of the items needed to create each monster is packaged together and there are picture instructions. My 3 year old granddaughter did a fabulous job and absolutely loved it! I have ordered 3 more Alex Toys craft kits!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Craft Kit
customer_reviews.text: I will keep buying Alex Toys crafts. Easiest, cutest craft kits. I wish the price point was a little lower but they are worth it. Simplified and a joy to put together. The glue stick adhesion is far from fool proof but as glue sticks go it’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity Bendixsen

customer_reviews.title: Not great for younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: My niece and nephew (age 4 and 3) had fun doing this but they should’ve used adhesive on the punch out cardboard pieces too. It came with a glue stick but because the bag was glossy, The glue wasn’t sticking very well. The stickers were great and wished all the pieces to decorate the bags were stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Shu

customer_reviews.title: Bad Shipping Practices
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this one star because Amazon slapped a label on it and mailed it with no shipping box. It arrived damaged, the shipping label won't peel off completely and it looks like crap. It was part of a gift, now I can't give it as one.
customer_reviews.author: VioletJune

customer_reviews.title: Valentine "boxes"
customer_reviews.text: Got the monsters. Instead of the puppet way we turn the bags right side up and decorated them. My 3 boys did these for their valentines "boxes" for the schools party. Bags are thick shiney colors. had to glue on hair, stripes, arms, legs. Came with glue stick. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lillian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to make puppets with 5 year olds when I stumbled upon this. What a great value for the money! It was hours of fun, easy to follow instructions, and ended up with a puppet and dance show - a very creative outlet for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: A fun activity that kids can do with little to no help.
customer_reviews.text: Three and six year old grand sons loved this. Good activity to keep them busy. Could do the projects with little to no help. The glue stick adhesion wasn't the best but still worked. We just used a better glue stick we had on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome. My 2 & 3 year old made some and there playing with them (as it still is sticking all together!) the glue was very strong, stickers sticked well, the paper bags itself are thick- material was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor K

customer_reviews.title: Great fun. Craft assembly geared for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for preschool. Granddaughters, ages 4 & 5, enjoyed the easy to assemble puppets. It’s difficult to find such fun crafts that preschool aged children both enjoy and are able to assemble with very little adult assistance. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: susan roling

customer_reviews.title: Kids Loved Them
customer_reviews.text: I had a few kids (Ages 8, 10, 11) complete these. They all loved them! They were easy to do with everything you need included. (May want extra glue sticks if you have a lot of kids.) They had a lot of fun, but it required NO prep and very easy cleanup. Five stars from me and the kids.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun, long-lasting toy/project
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toy! It provides so much fun and engagement. Really fun to do together with a 2 year old, and I imagine an older kid would love to do it on their own. And the puppets, once made, are surprisingly durable. A huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality actually exceeded my expectations. The bags are durable and brightly colored. The instructions are easy to follow and finished project actually looks like what is advertised. My 3 year old loved making them.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is autistic, and arts and crafts projects soothe her. We got this as one of her Christmas gifts, and it was a huge hit! The product is much higher quality than i expected. The paper is sturdy, and the parts are made from card stock so it’s not flimsy at all! I am very satisfied and will be purchasing more for my other children! Got a little one who loves art and hands on crafts? Definitely buy these little puppets. Your child willl love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: No gluestick
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable in every way. Simple and colorful with easy to follow directions. Problem was, they did not come with a glue stick as promised. We had our granddaughter here for Easter from out of state. When we sat down to do this craft project, with no glue stick, it is impossible. I only had super glue at home. Used it, but could not let granddaughter use it. Did not want her fingers stuck together. That was the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: BobKat

customer_reviews.title: Great activity
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this kit!! The glue isn’t the best but I’d you apply liberally + use the stickers at the end to keep things stuck you’re all set. My daughter made all in the box and hugged them saying “look at my friends!!”. Pretty adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Morecoffee

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun Puppets
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren absolutely loved these puppets! My 5 year old taught her 3 year old sister how to create and they had a blast! Everything is organized and packaged for easy assembly. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: CM2378

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 kits for our Grandparents Day activity in a preschool classroom. I gave each child and grandparent pair their choice of kit, a glue stick (my own) and a copy of the instructions for their kits. Everyone had a good time assembling them. The children were able to do a lot of the process and had opportunity to be creative in how they put on the stickers. The grandparents was able to read the directions and help the child know how to assemble parts in proper sequence. I will use this, or another one of ALEX Toys Little Hands kits, again next year. I was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kanale

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and I just wish it was packaged when mailed. All the labels to mail it we're just stuck on the box so it covered what it is and looks super tacky. Maybe at least out it in some sort of paper wrapping to mail it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We just finished up all five puppets this week, and I have to say I'm thoroughly impressed!! Excellent quality, zero prep time, toddler loved it, finished product adorable. Six out of five stars from this mama & teacher! :)
customer_reviews.author: KIsaDuds

customer_reviews.title: Fun and don’t take up much space
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved these. The one complaint is the included glue stick doesn’t hold very well at all, but that’s easily fixed with a little Elmer’s glue. He had a lot of fun with these and they don’t take up much space or hurt if you step on them like his other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 4 year old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it because it was fun, easy to put together and she could express her creativity! My daughter loved it because it kept my granddaughter occupied for hours! Win...Win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a crafty person and being able to get these kits to do with my kids is awesome. It makes crafts so easy and fun. The finished product is better than anything I could make on my own. You will need some scotch tape, but for the deal you're getting a little tape to add is nothing. After finishing this craft with my kids I ordered 4 more of their products. I just can't say enough good about this, it's a gift to sit and do these with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional craft kit!
customer_reviews.text: This craft kit is so well made! The materials are sturdy and hold up beautifully to a 4 year old’s energy. The colors are vivid, paper heavy duty and each puppet is individually wrapped so it’s easy to get a toddler to focus on one & save others for another rainy day. Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: R & H

customer_reviews.title: So adorablee
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. It was super simple and my toddler loved it. It was pretty easy for her to put the parts together. It even came with a jumbo glue stick for kids. Good deal for your money. Gives you ideas for future crafts. I plan on buying lots of other materials and using the instructions to create my own. I'll definitely purchase these again. The only con is that there are like 4 animals. I wish it came with like 6-8. I'll be posting all the boxes and craft projects on my blog on Wordpress- nihaoryann
customer_reviews.author: Ashleeebbaa

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: We built the lion puppet, it's very cute. Each puppet comes in its own plastic bag of supplies (colored paper bag for puppets, arms and legs to glue on etc). It even came with a glue stick. Great little projects for rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids (2, 3 & 4 yo) enjoyed.
customer_reviews.text: Glue stick worked better than those I have used in the past. Kept their attention as well as anything does, lol. Each project wrapped separately and no scissors required. Easy for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy, and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my five year old. She was able to complete all of the puppets without supervision and loved the process! Very nice quality and easy to use out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Cute kit but glue stick terrible
customer_reviews.text: Cute product the kids enjoyed it but the glue stick that came with it was completely dried out and unusable. Luckily I had some spares. I did get one of every animal and the quality of the materials was high. It was easy for my 2.5 year old grandson to put together with some gentle guidance. It would be a 5 if the glue stick worked
customer_reviews.author: Lori E

customer_reviews.title: Great project for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the kids table at our wedding so the little ones would be occupied if they got bored with dinner. Was a super great hit and I bought too many so made them with neighbors kids and they are CUTE CUTE CUTE. Kids under 4 need a bit of assistance but super easy and fun to make!! You will need stick glue (non toxic) for some of the items.
customer_reviews.author: vivian b smith

customer_reviews.title: Kept my kids occupied for several hours
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, was easy to use for my 4 yo without assistance and her 7 yo brother put together couple of animals as well. A lot of fun without mess. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FLGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my children!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved making the paper bag monsters. To give a little insight they are 2, 3, 4 and 7. I did like that they have stickers for some parts and the glue for the other parts which made it an excellent learning experience for my toddlers and even my older son. Loved the different color bags. It did come with instructions which we didn’t use cause it’s fun to be creative and mix up parts. I would’ve loved it to be a little bit more fuller with more paper monsters but hey beggars can’t be choosers lol.
customer_reviews.author: Carindjrsmom

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun and easy project for my 6 year old daughter and twin 4 year old boys. Everything you see on the box is what you get. I will definitely purchase other Alex Toys craft kits in the future. A lot of other reviews mentioned that the glue stick doesn't work well and on that I can agree. But we had some Elmer's glue sticks at home so it worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun to put together and play with. Really good price too. The glue it comes with doesn’t stick very well tho. You may want to use Elmer's liquid glue or something like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this kit & so did my granddaughter. My 3 year old granddaughter was able to do most of it by herself with a little guidance from me. The finished paper bag puppets are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaWil

customer_reviews.title: High quality product- and cute monsters!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality materials, vibrant colors, and individualized kits per monster - overall a well done product. My 3 yr old son had a blast and the monsters came out great. The glue stick that came in the box was super sticky so we didn’t have to wait for anything to dry to complete the project. It was my first time buying something from this company and after my experience with this, it will not be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nieces had a blast!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces had a blast making these puppets; inexpensive gift that offered lots of fun for kids! Kids were 5 and 4 years old. Great xmas or birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Terri B.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was sooo much fun to do with my three year old! It’s age appropriate, enough where your little one can be creative. The guide is colorful and simple so your child can follow along easily! You can give it as a gift as well! It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Vania R.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love these art kits! We have 4 of them and they keep my 4 year old entertained and busy. They come with everything you need. Very affordable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: Great craft kits
customer_reviews.text: I was hosting a play date with 3 kids. The package arrived right when I ran out of play ideas and the kids started to get bored. I opened it and instantaneously the kids sat down around the table to make crafts. It was a life savior! It's the right level of difficulty and fun for 3-4 year olds. And they were proud of the finished products.
customer_reviews.author: David Vigier

customer_reviews.title: A hit with preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: These puppet kits were so cute! We did get each design in the box, and the picture instructions were easy to follow. Glue didn’t adhere very well but this is easily fixed with tape and/or other glue. Great gift for preschoolers!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 grandchildren love it after all put together
customer_reviews.text: This really needs to be a all sticker craft because the glue stick they give with it doesn't keep the pieces on. We used our own glue and it help a little for the parks to stay on. Our 2 grandchildren love it after all put together.
customer_reviews.author: Genea Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Colorful
customer_reviews.text: I sent these to my friend for her 3-year-old. She and her kid made them together and seemed to have a lot of fun in the process. The colors are brilliant and they remained in tact, although paper is only so durable, so they can and have torn a bit. Great and inexpensive (and creative) gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome craft for the busy parent
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I was a little skeptical doing this craft with my 3 yr old. But she loved it! It was easy to do and pretty easy to clean up as well! Everything was of a great durable quality too! I plan on buying the monsters for another rainy day craft.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Ace
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the favorite gift from Christmas for my preschoolers. They had lots of expensive toys and games but a simple colorful art project definitely won their hearts. Would definitely recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Justforme

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas gift for my 3 year old niece and I was told that they were a hit! Her mom told me they made all the puppets in one sitting because she was having such a blast. I'm sure you could get your own supplies and make TONS of these for cheaper, but it's nice having everything packaged together and the cost was certainly not prohibitive. Plus, it's a lot easier to tell your kid "Oh no, we are all out!" when you don't have any endless stream of brown bags and construction paper!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old niece loved putting these together. It was nice that each puppet and accessories came individually wrapped! Glue worked, but I did have to use tape on some pieces
customer_reviews.author: chiklit

customer_reviews.title: Great Craft for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great craft project for young kids ! My 3 and 5 year olds loved making this bag puppets from putting them together to playing with them. I absolutely love that each of the projects were individually packaged which made it easy to just open the project package that they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product packing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets and each set/box was mailed seperately in its own envelope. Upon delivery each of the product boxes inside the envelopes were damaged. The contents of the boxes appear to be fine, however I am unable to display the boxes in order to promote a classroom project. I'm a bit dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fun diy for your little one
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you want to have craft time but you don’t want to gather all the supplies yourself and look up what to make. Everything you need is in this box and it came out so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Liz b

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year Old Niece Loved It
customer_reviews.text: My niece is three and she loved this! She wanted to take it out of the box and start putting it together right away. I don't like buying her toys. She gets way too many toys and only plays with them for a few weeks before getting bored. This is great because it involves an engaging activity.
customer_reviews.author: J Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: What a great craft-excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons, 3, 6 and 8 all loved this craft. The instructions were clear and the quality superb. We all had fun. Lots of accessories no cutting required.
customer_reviews.author: KAT SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Works as a tree topper!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for airplane travels it was a great item to have one hand. We ended up using the lion as a tree topper for the kids tree!!
customer_reviews.author: sassyskis

customer_reviews.title: My twins loved this and it kept them BUSY!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome. If you're like me and don't have a whole lot of time to buy art supplies, this kit is for you. It comes with everything you need and they puppets were really cute and were very durable. The glue stick that comes with it is extra chunky which is great for little hands. It also is purple so when it's put on paper, the kids can see where they're applying it. My girls are three and this had glue (which is always a hit with kids right?), colorful paper, and a ton of stickers for each animal puppet. It kept them busy for a while and they got to play with them afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great crafting activity!
customer_reviews.text: This was our first box of ALEX Toys, I really like how organized it was and how easy it is for the little ones. Unfortunately our kit did not come with a glue stick. I used double sided tape until I got a glue stick, since my son was excited about putting it together. Tape doesn't work very well, but the glue did...after I got one! I will still get more if these in the future because I really like them and so does my son. Overall I'm happy with the product, I just wish it came with everything that it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for car trips and birthday parties
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for my almost 4 year old to use on a LONG car trip. They were a hit and kept him engaged. I ordered two more sets as a time filler indoor craft to use at the 4 year old birthday party (with next day shipping, because it was a last minute idea). All the kids made them (with a tiny bit of assistance) and loved them. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Paper bag puppet fun!
customer_reviews.text: I am a therapist that works with kids with special needs in the school system. This is a great activity to use with the kids to make paper bag animal puppets. The puppets are easy to make are very fun to play with afterwards with the kids. The company gives you directions for each animal to make it easy to follow. Great for young kids!
customer_reviews.author: Leah C

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 4 year old and above!
customer_reviews.text: This set of paper bag puppets is so well laid out that my 4 year old was able to follow the visual directions and make the puppets on her own. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for monster lovers.
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old loves monsters and everything about monsters. We love making them together. My only complaint is that the stickers are hard for him to get off the sheet, and I feel the same too. Other than that he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: Creative fun!
customer_reviews.text: Made the first day we received them. Great product, let’s even the youngest assemble. Non electronic big plus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Petty

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure some little girl or boy was happy to get paper bag puppets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to donate to my local Blue Santa Toy Drive, a program that our police officers started years ago. They take toys to children whose parents can't afford to get them anything for Christmas. I'm sure some little girl or boy was happy to get paper bag puppets.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this, my nephew loves it. We make them together and he loves to play with them afterwards. Great gift to keep your little one busy.
customer_reviews.author: Taleen kouyoumdjian

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny!!! We had so much fun with these! They are durable and amazing. Simple but took some time to make. Great craft!
customer_reviews.author: JKim

customer_reviews.title: Fun in a box!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved making these and grandma loved that everything was included in the box! Great price point, I think you would be hard pressed to gather these supplies separately for under $10.
customer_reviews.author: Meda.Lass

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little crafter
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my Grandson, 4 years old, he loves to do arts and crafts. He was able to do this all by himself and had so much fun making these paper bags puppets. Comes with everything you need, including a giant glue stick. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Berney

customer_reviews.title: Pandemic Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for a couple of days worth of entertainment. Easy for kids 4 and up to put together and then play with.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craft Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this craft project!!! My grand daughter is 3 1/2 and she thoroughly loves making and playing with her colorful puppet friends. Excellent craft project for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughter. She loves it, and the puppets are very cute. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute project, individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, held the attention of toddlers much longer than I expected. LOVE that they are packaged individually by puppet so you can put some away for another use and/or keep multiple kids from arguing over pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Package
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in a package or box. It was a Christmas present for my child & he saw it on the porch. Not covered at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this. As a mom of many, I appreciate crafts over junk toys. Kids can make and play with these, and they know it’s not gonna a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Activity for 4-5-Year-Olds
customer_reviews.text: Bought this craft for a family vacation with 3 grandchildren ages 4, 4 and 5. Although the project was age-appropriate, one-on-one adult assistance was a must. These are sturdy and all children were delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Creekinwa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute activity for pre-k age
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fun. Needed just a little grown-up help for my 4.5 year old to do it.
customer_reviews.author: glh01

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves crafts. She is almost 5 so the picture directions is fantastic idea for her! I do think the directions could be a little more detailed for a child to follow. Need Lots and lots of the glue stick for the items to stay stuck while the child is using the puppet would be my only complaint. She loved these and wished they had more variety.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy for child to enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and easy to assemble. Picture instructions are easy for child to follow. Glue stick and stickers are easy to use. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Lash

customer_reviews.title: Fun short activity to do with your little one
customer_reviews.text: Love how each puppet is in its own packet - just pull one out and you have a fun activity - takes about 10-15 minutes per one. Perfect activity for my 2 1/2 year old and me to do while my youngest is taking a nap. She can then play with it while I attend to other things that need my attention. I didn't give it 5 stars because it is still a paper bag (but a very thick, sturdy one)... don't expect them to last very long with much play. For the price would definitely recommend though.
customer_reviews.author: JMP1002

product_meta.title: Alex Discover Paper Bag Puppets Kids Art and Craft Activity
product_meta.description: Style:PuppetsALEX Discover Paper Bag Puppets lets your child make puppets with ordinary paper bags and then keep the fun going by putting on a show. Just peel, stick and glue to create funny friends. Step by step instructions are included with no reading required. Each project comes individually wrapped and ready to begin when you open the box. Using the included instructions, children can learn how to make their own crafts for years to come. They will learn all of the valuable skills to become more talented at arts and crafts as a whole. By showing how young crafters can use the included supplies, they'll also form new hobbies and develop skills that they can bring to future projects. Includes 5 colored bags (6in. x 9.5in.), 270 stickers and paper shapes, chunky glue stick (1.4oz.) and easy picture instructions. Recommended for children 3 years of age and older. Bullet feature 1 (optional) : Get creative and make paper bag puppets.
feature_bullets: Get creative and make paper bag puppets
Each puppet is bagged separately so you can save them for another rainy day, or have several kids participate at once
Parents' Magazine Best Toys of the Year and Parents' Choice Approved Award Winner
Includes 5 colored bags, 270 stickers and paper shapes, glue stick and easy picture instructions
Recommended for children 3 years of age and older
